input: A visual explanation of what the chain rule and product rule are, and why they are true.
translatedText: Penjelasan visual tentang aturan rantai dan aturan produk, dan mengapa aturan tersebut benar.
Membantu mendanai proyek masa depan: https://www.patreon.com/3blue1 brown

input: This video was sponsored by Brilliant: https://brilliant.org/3b1b
translatedText: Video ini disponsori oleh Brilliant: https://brilliant.org/3b1b

input: An equally valuable form of support is to simply share some of the videos.
translatedText: Bentuk dukungan yang sama berharganya adalah dengan membagikan beberapa video.
Terima kasih khusus kepada para pendukung ini: http://3b1b.co/lessons/chain-rule-and-product-rule#thanks

input: Series like this one are funded largely by the community, through Patreon, where supporters get early access as the series is being produced.
translatedText: Serial seperti ini sebagian besar didanai oleh komunitas, melalui Patreon, di mana para pendukung mendapatkan akses awal saat serial tersebut diproduksi.
